org.sakaiproject.user.impl

Interface UserServiceSql

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceSqlDb2, UserServiceSqlDefault, UserServiceSqlHSql, UserServiceSqlMsSql, UserServiceSqlMySql, UserServiceSqlOracle

    public interface UserServiceSql
    database methods.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDeleteUserIdSql()
      return the sql statement which deletes an external user id for a given user from the sakai_user_id_map table.
      String getInsertUserIdSql()
      return the sql statement which inserts a user id and an external user id into the sakai_user_id_map table.
      int getMaxInputsForSelectWhereInQueries()
      The maximum size of a "SELECT...

      return the sql statement which updates an external user id for a given user in the sakai_user_id_map table.

      return the sql statement which retrieves an external user id for a given user from the sakai_user_id_map table.
      String getUserIdSql()
      return the sql statement which retrieves the user id for a given user from the sakai_user_id_map table.

      String getUserWhereSql()
      return the sql statement which retrieves the where clause from the sakai_user_id_map table.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeleteUserIdSql

        String getDeleteUserIdSql()
        return the sql statement which deletes an external user id for a given user from the sakai_user_id_map table.

      • getInsertUserIdSql

        String getInsertUserIdSql()
        return the sql statement which inserts a user id and an external user id into the sakai_user_id_map table.

      • getUpdateUserIdSql

        String getUpdateUserIdSql()
        return the sql statement which updates an external user id for a given user in the sakai_user_id_map table.

      • getUserEidSql

        String getUserEidSql()
        return the sql statement which retrieves an external user id for a given user from the sakai_user_id_map table.

      • getUserIdSql

        String getUserIdSql()
        return the sql statement which retrieves the user id for a given user from the sakai_user_id_map table.

      • getUserWhereSql

        String getUserWhereSql()
        return the sql statement which retrieves the where clause from the sakai_user_id_map table.

      • getUsersWhereEidsInSql

        String getUsersWhereEidsInSql(int numberOfSearchValues)
        Return a "SELECT... WHERE... IN" statement to find multiple user records by EID in a single query. The EID value count is used to generate the correct "(?, ?, ?)" string.

      • getUsersWhereIdsInSql

        String getUsersWhereIdsInSql(int numberOfSearchValues)
        Return a "SELECT... WHERE... IN" statement to find multiple user records (with their EIDs) by ID in a single query. The ID value count is used to generate the correct "(?, ?, ?)" string.

      • getMaxInputsForSelectWhereInQueries

        int getMaxInputsForSelectWhereInQueries()
        The maximum size of a "SELECT... WHERE... IN" query varies by database, but when it's reached, the error can be difficult to interpret. This should be set to a reasonably safe value and used by clients to break very long queries into a set of somewhat shorter ones.
